trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_000<tab>Up to something? Me? Never! I am but a fun-loving imp, here to help my fellow revelers enjoy the Wake! And I can fashion you a <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> convincing guise for the masquerade. Ehehehe...
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_001<tab>All I need is for you to recall a journey, a journey unforgettable. Traverse your memories, and tell me what you see...
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_001<tab>A journey to liberate lands near and far.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_002<tab>A journey to reclaim the night sky.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A1_000_003<tab>A journey to silence the song of oblivion.

TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_002<tab>Good, good. Now think of someone remarkable you encountered in that time, someone <var 1A 02 /var>powerful<var 1A 01 /var>. Yes, that's it...
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_000<tab>A dauntless Hyuran man of integrity from the Far East.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_001<tab>A devoted Auri woman who has mastered the art of the shinobi.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_002<tab>A haughty but valorous Auri man with a yearning heart.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_003<tab>An Auri woman strong of body and stronger of will.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_004<tab>A sweet Auri woman who lives according to her faith.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_005<tab>A crimson-garbed Hyuran woman fleet of foot and fist.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_006<tab>A Hyuran man whose strength and compassion made him a legend.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_007<tab>A vindictive Hyuran man of savage political cunning.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_008<tab>A Garlean man who hunts the servants of Darkness.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_009<tab>An erudite Auri woman who holds the title of Archon.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_010<tab>A Hyuran man inspired to take up the arms of his Ala Mhigan allies.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_011<tab>A Hyuran man inspired to take up the arms of his Far Eastern allies.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_020<tab>A sagacious Miqo'te woman skilled in the magical arts.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_021<tab>An Elezen man who reads the stars as easily as his tomes.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_022<tab>A handsome Hyuran man who fights to protect those he loves.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_023<tab>A dainty Hyuran woman who chose to carve her own fate.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_024<tab>A Hyuran man who keeps his pirate crew in line as their acting captain.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_025<tab>A Hyuran man famed for his skills as a beastmaster.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_026<tab>An obstinate Lalafellin woman from a distinguished family of beastmasters.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_027<tab>A cruel Garlean man who serves as a legatus of the Empire.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_028<tab>A Hyuran man who brought the night sky to a world flooded by Light.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_030<tab>An Elezen man who serves as a respected member of the Forum.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_031<tab>A compassionate Elezen woman determined to give children a brighter future.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_032<tab>A Garlean man determined to restore the broken remains of his homeland.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_033<tab>A Viera man who travels the world in search of esoteric curios.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_034<tab>A Hyuran man who crossed time and space to protect this star.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_035<tab>A Hyuran man who spends his life collecting treasures of the Far East.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_036<tab>A Miqo'te woman who shares her body with the soul of an ancient magus.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_A2_000_040<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_004<tab>Ehehehe... That will do nicely. Don't worry, this won't hurt much at all! Just close your eyes...
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>The transfiguration can be removed by using the “Unveil” action, or by canceling the “Transfiguration” status effect.
TEXT_FESHLW2023TRANSFORM2_00835_TRANSFORMHLW2023_000_010<tab>Pay no mind to this little imp! I'm <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> busy during the Wake─I've no time for mundane mummers, no.
